remarks: The exclusion of finite sets from consideration in ~ df-gch is necessary, because otherwise finite sets larger than a singleton would violate the GCH property.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jun-2015.)
statement: finngch $p |- ( ( A e. Fin /\ 1o ~< A ) -> ( A ~< ( A +c 1o ) /\ ( A +c 1o ) ~< ~P A ) ) $.
